desc: Reusable, magnetic matching games for Veterinary Nurses. These A4 matching games can be used over and over as many times as you need and are perfect for visual and kinaesthetic learners. They are supplied with an A6 flashcard with the answers or to be used for revision on-the-go.

layout.text:
I have created a range of unique, reusable revision tools as a more sustainable resource for Veterinary Nursing Students.
They could also come in handy for Veterinary, Animal Care and Biology students. 
These magnetic matching games are perfect for visual and kinesthetic learners, and allow you to complete the game as many times as you need.
They are also light weight enough to be displayed as a poster once completed, to refresh your memory in-between uses.
All games are supplied with an A6 flash card that is printed with a fully labelled image to provide you with answers or to be used for revision on-the-go! 
*IMPORTANT NOTICE*
PLEASE ALLOW UP TO 7 DAYS FOR DISPATCH
